scripts.build: echo build web site .. && lerna run build --parallel && echo done. && shx echo
scripts.bump: cross-var cross-env if-env J1DOCKER=true && run-s -s bump-docker || run-s -s bump-local
scripts.setup: npm --silent run setup-start && npm --silent run setup-base && run-s -s setup-create-log-folders && run-s -s setup:*
scripts.ver: cross-var echo "project version: $npm_package_version" && echo package versions: && lerna ls && cd ./packages/500_theme_gem && bump current | shx sed "s/Current version:/Gem version:    /"
scripts.bump-local: run-s -s ver && run-s -s bump-version:* && run-s -s ver
scripts.bump-docker: shx mv package-lock.json .package-lock.json && run-s -s ver && run-s -s bump-version:* && run-s -s ver && shx mv .package-lock.json package-lock.json
scripts.clean:bundle-folder: echo remove bundle folder .. && shx rm -rf .bundle
scripts.clean:log-folder: echo remove log folder .. && shx rm -rf log
scripts.clean:log-files: echo remove log files .. && shx rm -f *.log && echo done.
scripts.clean:packages: shx echo && echo clean up project packages .. && lerna run --parallel clean
scripts.credential:echo: shx echo && echo store username and password ..
scripts.credential:set: git config credential.helper store && echo done. && shx echo
scripts.reset:start: echo reset development system to factory state .. && shx echo
scripts.reset:clean: shx echo && echo remove js modules from all packages .. && lerna clean --yes
scripts.setup:files: echo create config files .. && lerna run --parallel jekyll_files && echo done.
scripts.setup:node-modules: shx echo && echo installing main project modules .. && shx echo >> install.log && echo installing main project modules .. >> install.log && npm --silent install >> install.log && echo done. >> install.log && shx echo >> install.log && echo done.
scripts.setup:lerna: shx echo && echo initialize development packages .. && lerna init && lerna bootstrap && echo done. && shx echo
scripts.setup:detect-os: echo detect operating system .. && cross-var cross-env if-env OS=Windows_NT && cross-var echo "operating system detected: $OS" || OS=$(echo $(getos)) && echo "operating system detected: $OS"
scripts.setup:links: shx echo && echo create links for shared resources .. && lerna run --parallel setup-links && echo done. && shx echo
scripts.setup-start: echo prepare project control && npm --silent install shx && echo done. && shx echo && echo setup development system for first use ..
scripts.setup-create-log-folders: shx echo && echo create project folders .. && run-s -s setup-create-folders:*
scripts.setup-create-folders:link-log-folder: shx ln -s packages/400_theme_site/log ./log && echo done. && shx echo
scripts.setup-base: echo installing base modules .. && echo installing base project modules .. > install.log && npm install shx npm-run-all cross-var cross-env >> install.log && echo done. >> install.log && shx echo >> install.log && echo done.
scripts.setup:env: shx echo && cross-var echo "configure environment .." && run-s -s set-env:*
scripts.setup:tip: shx echo && echo run "yarn site" to open the web.
scripts.child-script: cross-env if-env BUNDLE_VENDORIZE=true && echo bundle vendorized || echo bundle global
